text: The Wilmot Proviso was a suggested American law to outlaw slavery in territory acquired from Mexico in the Mexicanâ€“American War. The conflict over the Wilmot proviso was one of the main events leading to the American Civil War. Lone Star: A History Of Texas And The Texans ==References== Category:Slavery in the United States Category:Origins of the American Civil War
title: Wilmot Proviso
